review_text: What a beautiful and relaxing accommodation. Tim and Joanie thought of everything down to the little details. Communication was excellent. The restaurant suggestions were spot on. We hope to stay again. Thank you for creating and sharing this peaceful space!

Convenient off interstate. Amenities provided. Comfortable "grandparents home" atmosphere. Ample parking for our U-Haul truck and car. It should be noted, however, that very-strongly scented laundry detergent and/or dryer sheets are used, which caused me a migraine the whole visit. For most people, this won't be the case, and you'll actually think everything smells "fresh and clean." But for those of us who have sensitivities to chemical fragrances, it was a very unpleasant stay for me in that respect, especially considering I'd asked BEFORE booking if there were any strong scents and was told, "No." But to be honest, I do not blame the hosts. Most people are not aware of just how much these scents can bother some people. And I know these types of scents are often preferable to others. So it's just a live-and-learn situation. The other notable things were the creakiness of the floors and the fussiness of the doors. (They really have to slam shut in order to actually close. The house must have settled wonky at some point.) So there are definitely noises heard from each room as a result, if you're staying with multiple guests, as I was.
